Uses of Class
org.goobi.production.model.bibliography.course.Block

  • Packages that use Block 
    Package Description
    de.sub.goobi.forms  
    org.goobi.production.model.bibliography.course
    Contains objects to model the course of appearance of a newspaper.

    • Uses of Block in de.sub.goobi.forms

      Fields in de.sub.goobi.forms declared as Block 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Block CalendarForm.blockShowing
      The field blockShowing holds the block currently showing in this calendar instance.
      Fields in de.sub.goobi.forms with type parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Map<String,Block> CalendarForm.blockChangerResolver
      The Map blockChangerResolver is populated with the IDs used in the block changer drop down element and the references to the block objects referenced by the IDs for easily looking them up upon change.

    • Uses of Block in org.goobi.production.model.bibliography.course

      Fields in org.goobi.production.model.bibliography.course declared as Block 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Block IndividualIssue.block
      Block that the issue this is an issue from is in.
      Methods in org.goobi.production.model.bibliography.course that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block Block.clone(Course course)
      The function clone() creates and returns a copy of this Block.
      Block Course.isMatch(org.joda.time.LocalDate date)
      The function isMatch() iterates over the array of blocks and returns the first one that matches a given date.
      Block Course.remove(int index)
      The function remove() removes the element at the specified position in this list.
      Methods in org.goobi.production.model.bibliography.course with parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Course.add(Block block)
      Appends the specified block to the end of this course.
